Posts.Content: Mar 16, 2010 08:28PM run4urlife wrote: How is it that ALH or ADH shows up on a needle biopsy but not the surgical one? And who is that referred you all the oncologists. I had ADH on the needle biopsy, but not the surgical one and no one mentioned anything to me about seeing an oncologist.Thank goodness for this board that I now know to do so!
